ssot__CaseUpdate__dlm.name: Case Update
ssot__CaseUpdate__dlm.description: The Case Update DMO represents historical information about changes made to the associated case.

ssot__CaseId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated case.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the case update DMO.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId___c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the case.

ssot__LastModifiedById__c.description: A reference ID to the user that made the last update.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the case update.

ssot__PreviousUpdateDateTime__c.description: The date and time the case was previously updated.

ssot__RelatedOwnerId__c.description: A reference ID to the related user for the update.

ssot__RelatedOwnerObject__c.description: The related owner object for the case update.

ssot__Status__c.description: The status of the case update.
